diff_hunk:
@@ -48,8 +48,11 @@ const char kUsageHeader[] =
     "through\n"
     "the 'org.tensorflow.op.Ops' API as a group until the generated classes "

body_html:
That's what I thought but looks like there is no group name in the ApiDef neither. I was hoping to find it in the ApiDef_Endpoint.name(), as the "Package" like it mentioned in the proto definition here:

// Name should be either like "CamelCaseName" or
// "Package.CamelCaseName". Client-language-specific ApiDefs may
// use a snake_case convention instead of CamelCase.
string name = 1;

but it looks that package is always empty and only the endpoint name part is present. Am I wrong?
